General.Name: Mahaka Radio Integra Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Mahaka Radio Integra Tbk engages in the radio broadcasting business in Indonesia. It owns and operates radio stations, including Jak fm, Gen fm, Gen fm Surabaya, Hot fm, Most fm, and Mustang fm, as well as operates digital platforms. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Menara Imperium Lt. P7, Jakarta, Indonesia, 12980
